page.title: 11RECREATION in Blindcrake
page.content: The Moota Motel complex includes squash courts as well as bars and dancing. Thre is little else generally available apart from the two pubs. One pub is very small, a dozen customers and it is bursting at the seams! Nevertheless it has hosted domino competitions. The Womens Institute and Mothers Union meet once a month for talks and slideshows etc, with the WI having craft type competitions. About 20 ladies normally attend. The Childrens Committee organises Halloween and Christmas parties for the children and the Village Outing is extreemly well patronised. Keep fit classes meet once a week in winter. All functions are in the Mission Rooms in Blindcrake. (See "RECREATION-HOBBIES")
